rdf:Description.dcterms:title: R√©gulation √©pig√©n√©tique de la d√©fense antioxydante et de l'Angiopoietin-like 2 dans le contexte du vieillissement et des maladies cardiovasculaires
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Suite √† l‚Äôexposition √† des facteurs de risque incluant la malnutrition, la dyslipid√©mie, la s√©dentarit√© et les d√©sordres m√©taboliques, les maladies cardiovasculaires (MCV) sont caract√©ris√©es par un √©tat pro-oxydant et pro-inflammatoire, et une d√©r√©gulation de l‚Äôexpression de divers facteurs responsables de l‚Äôhom√©ostasie de l‚Äôenvironnement r√©dox et inflammatoire. L‚Äôimplication d‚Äôenzymes antioxydantes telles que les superoxyde dismutases (SOD) et les glutathion peroxydases (Gpx), ainsi que la contribution de m√©diateurs pro-inflammatoires tels que l‚Äôangiopoietin-like 2 (Angptl2) ont √©t√© rapport√©es dans le cadre des MCV. Toutefois, les m√©canismes mol√©culaires sensibles aux facteurs de risque et menant au d√©veloppement des MCV sont peu connus. L‚Äô√©pig√©n√©tique est un m√©canisme de r√©gulation de l‚Äôexpression g√©nique sensible aux stimuli extracellulaires et pourrait donc contribuer au d√©veloppement des MCV. La m√©thylation de l‚ÄôADN est un des m√©canismes √©pig√©n√©tiques pouvant varier tant de mani√®re g√®ne-sp√©cifique qu‚Äô√† l‚Äô√©chelle g√©nomique, et la cons√©quence de tels changements sur l‚Äôexpression des g√®nes cibl√©s d√©pend du site de m√©thylation. Puisqu‚Äôil a √©t√© d√©montr√© que des variations au niveau de la m√©thylation de l‚ÄôADN peuvent √™tre associ√©es √† divers contextes pathologiques incluant les MCV, le but de nos travaux √©tait d‚Äô√©tudier le lien entre la m√©thylation de g√®nes antioxydants et pro-inflammatoires avec leurs r√©percussions fonctionnelles biologiques en pr√©sence de facteurs de risques associ√©s aux MCV, tels que le vieillissement, la dyslipid√©mie et la s√©dentarit√©. Dans la premi√®re √©tude, nous avons observ√© que dans l‚Äôart√®re f√©morale de souris vieillissantes, la m√©thylation au niveau du promoteur du g√®ne Sod2, codant pour l‚Äôenzyme antioxydante superoxyde dismutase de type 2 (SOD2 ou MnSOD), diminue avec l‚Äô√¢ge. Ceci serait associ√© √† l‚Äôinduction de l‚Äôexpression de MnSOD, renfor√ßant ainsi la d√©fense antioxydante endog√®ne. Le vieillissement √©tant associ√© √† une accumulation de la production de radicaux libres, nous avons √©tudi√© la vasodilatation d√©pendante de l‚Äôendoth√©lium qui est sensible au stress oxydant. Nous avons observ√© que la capacit√© vasodilatatrice globale a √©t√© maintenue chez les souris √¢g√©es, aux d√©pens d‚Äôune diminution des facteurs hyperpolarisants d√©riv√©s de l‚Äôendoth√©lium (EDHF) et d‚Äôune contribution accentu√©e de la voie du monoxyde d‚Äôazote (NO). Nous avons ensuite utilis√© deux approches visant √† r√©duire les niveaux de stress oxydant in vivo, soit la suppl√©mentation avec un antioxydant, la cat√©chine, et l‚Äôexposition chronique √† de l‚Äôexercice physique volontaire. Ces interventions ont permis de pr√©venir √† la fois les changements au niveau de la fonction endoth√©liale et de l‚Äôhypom√©thylation de Sod2. Cette premi√®re √©tude d√©montre donc la sensibilit√© de la m√©thylation de l‚ÄôADN √† l‚Äôenvironnement r√©dox. Dans la deuxi√®me √©tude, nous avons d√©montr√© une r√©gulation de l‚Äôexpression de l‚Äôenzyme antioxydante glutathion peroxydase 1 (Gpx1) en lien avec la m√©thylation de son g√®ne codant, Gpx1, dans un contexte de dyslipid√©mie s√©v√®re. Nos r√©sultats d√©montrent que dans le muscle squelettique de souris transg√©niques s√©v√®rement dyslipid√©miques (LDLr-/-; hApoB+/+), Gpx1 est hyperm√©thyl√©, ce qui diminue l‚Äôexpression de Gpx1 et affaiblit la d√©fense antioxydante endog√®ne. Chez ces souris, l‚Äôexercice physique chronique a permis d‚Äôaugmenter l‚Äôexpression de Gpx1 en lien avec une hypom√©thylation transitoire de son g√®ne. Cette √©tude d√©montre que le stress oxydant associ√© √† la dyslipid√©mie s√©v√®re alt√®re les m√©canismes de d√©fense antioxydante, en partie via un m√©canisme √©pig√©n√©tique. De plus, on observe √©galement que l‚Äôexercice physique permet de renverser ces effets et peut induire des changements √©pig√©n√©tiques, mais de mani√®re transitoire. La troisi√®me √©tude avait pour but d‚Äô√©tudier la r√©gulation de l‚ÄôAngptl2, une prot√©ine circulante pro-inflammatoire, dans le contexte des MCV. Nous avons observ√© que chez des patients coronariens, la concentration circulante d‚ÄôAngptl2 est significativement plus √©lev√©e que chez des sujets sains et ce, en lien avec une hypom√©thylation de son g√®ne, ANGPTL2, mesur√©e dans les leucocytes circulants. Nous sommes les premiers √† d√©montrer qu‚Äôen r√©ponse √† l‚Äôenvironnement pro-inflammatoire associ√© √† une MCV, l‚Äôexpression de l‚ÄôAngptl2 est stimul√©e par un m√©canisme √©pig√©n√©tique. Nos √©tudes ont permis d‚Äôidentifier des nouvelles r√©gions r√©gulatrices diff√©rentiellement m√©thyl√©es situ√©es dans les g√®nes impliqu√©s dans la d√©fense antioxydante, soit Sod2 en lien avec le vieillissement et Gpx1 en lien avec la dyslipid√©mie et l‚Äôexercice. Nous avons √©galement d√©montr√© un m√©canisme de r√©gulation de l‚ÄôAngptl2 d√©pendant de la m√©thylation d‚ÄôANGPTL2 et ce, pour la premi√®re fois dans un contexte de MCV. Ces observations illustrent la nature dynamique de la r√©gulation √©pig√©n√©tique par la m√©thylation de l‚ÄôADN en r√©ponse aux stimuli environnementaux. Nos √©tudes contribuent ainsi √† la compr√©hension et l‚Äôidentification de m√©canismes mol√©culaires impliqu√©s dans le d√©veloppement du ph√©notype pathologique suite √† l‚Äôexposition aux facteurs de risque, ce qui ouvre la voie √† de nouvelles approches th√©rapeutiques. -- Following exposure to risk factors including malnutrition, dyslipidemia, physical inactivity and metabolic disorders, cardiovascular diseases (CVD) are characterized by a pro-oxidative and pro-inflammatory state, and a dysregulation in the expression of various factors responsible for the redox and inflammatory environment homeostasis. The implication of antioxidant enzymes, such as superoxide dismutases (SOD) and glutathione peroxidases (Gpx), as well as the contribution of pro-inflammatory mediators such as angiopoietin-like 2 (Angptl2) are well characterized in the context of CVD. However, little is known about the molecular mechanisms sensitive to environmental cues leading to the development of CVD. Epigenetics are mechanisms regulating gene expression that are sensitive to extracellular stimuli and could therefore contribute to the pathogenesis of CVD. DNA methylation is an epigenetic mechanism that can vary both at gene and genomic levels; the consequence of these epigenetic changes on the expression of targeted genes is dependent on the methylation site. Since it has been reported that DNA methylation variations can be associated with diverse pathological conditions including CVD, the goal of our work was to study the link between the methylation of antioxidant and pro-inflammatory genes, and their consequences on biological functions in the context of risk factors associated with CVD, such as aging, dyslipidemia and physical inactivity. In the first study, we observed that in the femoral artery of aging mice, the methylation at the promoter of the Sod2 gene, which codes for the antioxidant enzyme superoxide dismutase, type 2 (SOD2 or MnSOD), decreases with age. This suggests an induction of MnSOD expression and thus a strengthening of the endogenous antioxidant defense. Since aging is associated with an accumulation of free radicals, we studied the endothelium-dependant vasodilation, known to be sensitive to oxidative stress. We observed that, overall, vasodilatory capacity was preserved in aging mice, due to a concomitant decrease in endothelium-derived hyperpolarizing factors (EDHF) and an increased contribution of the nitric oxide (NO) pathway. We then used two in vivo oxidative stress-reducing approaches, namely the supplementation with the antioxidant catechin and chronic exposure to voluntary physical exercise. These interventions prevented the changes in endothelial function and the Sod2 hypomethylation-dependent induction of MnSOD expression. Hence, this first study demonstrates the sensitivity of DNA methylation to the redox environment. In the second study, we demonstrated that the antioxidant enzyme glutathione peroxidase 1 (Gpx1) expression was regulated through the methylation of its coding gene, Gpx1, in the context of severe dyslipidemia. Our results show that in the skeletal muscle of severely dyslipidemic transgenic mice (LDLr-/-; hApoB+/+), Gpx1 is hypermethylated, which in turn decreased Gpx1 expression and weakened the endogenous antioxidant defense. In these mice, chronic physical exercise managed to increase Gpx1 expression, an effect linked with a transient gene hypomethylation. This study demonstrates that oxidative stress associated with severe dyslipidemia alters antioxidant defense mechanisms, partially through an epigenetic mechanism. Moreover, we also observed that physical exercise can revert these changes and can induce epigenetic changes, at least transiently. The goal of the third project was to study Angptl2 regulation, a circulating pro-inflammatory protein, in the context of CVD. We observed that, in coronary patients, circulating Angptl2 concentration is significantly increased in conjunction with hypomethylation of its gene, ANGPTL2, measured in circulating leukocytes. We are the first to show that in response to the pro-inflammatory environment associated with a CVD, Angptl2 expression is stimulated by an epigenetic mechanism. In conclusion, our studies allowed the identification of novel regulatory differentially methylated regions located in genes involved in antioxidant defense, namely Sod2, in the context of aging, and Gpx1 in the context of dyslipidemia and exercise. We also revealed, for the first time, an Angptl2 regulating mechanism dependent on ANGPTL2 methylation in a context of CVD. These observations illustrate the dynamic nature of epigenetic regulation through DNA methylation in response to environmental cues. Our studies therefore contribute to the understanding and identification of molecular mechanisms involved in the development of pathological phenotypes following exposure to risk factors, which opens the way to novel therapeutic strategies.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Les instruments actuariels d'√©valuation du risque de r√©cidive : applicables aux auteurs d'infractions sexuelles ayant une d√©ficience intellectuelle?
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: L‚Äôint√©r√™t port√© √† l‚Äô√©valuation du risque de r√©cidive chez les d√©linquants ayant une d√©ficience intellectuelle (DI) a notablement augment√© depuis les 10 derni√®res ann√©es. Trois objectifs ont √©t√© pos√©s pour tenter d‚Äô√©claircir ces deux visions, soit 1) Comparer les taux de r√©cidive entre les deux groupes d‚Äôauteurs d‚Äôinfractions sexuelles (ayant une DI et neurotypiques), en plus de d√©terminer lequel r√©cidive plus rapidement sur une courte p√©riode de temps, 2) Analyser la validit√© pr√©dictive de huit instruments actuariels (et de la PCL-R) aupr√®s d‚Äôun √©chantillon d‚Äôauteurs d‚Äôinfractions sexuelles ayant une DI et 3) Analyser la composition des instruments par domaines (Knight et Thornton, 2007). L‚Äô√©chantillon est compos√© de 550 auteurs d‚Äôinfractions sexuelles dont 54 ont une DI. Les r√©sultats sugg√®rent que les deux groupes d‚Äôauteurs d‚Äôinfractions sexuelles (neurotypiques et ayant une DI) pr√©sentent des taux de r√©cidive similaires. Un nombre restreint d‚Äôinstruments semblent par contre efficaces chez les auteurs d‚Äôinfractions sexuelles ayant une DI. De ce fait, le SVR-20 s‚Äôest r√©v√©l√© avoir une validit√© pr√©dictive pour la r√©cidive sexuelle, le RMC, le RMV et le MnSOST-R pour la r√©cidive violente et le VRAG pour la r√©cidive non violente. Il est toutefois justifi√© de se questionner sur la mani√®re d‚Äô√©valuer le risque chez cette client√®le particuli√®re. L‚Äôanalyse de la composition des instruments semble importante puisque certains domaines pourraient pr√©dire diff√©remment la r√©cidive chez les auteurs d‚Äôinfractions sexuelles ayant une DI. Une grande partie des facteurs pouvant √™tre utiles dans la pr√©diction de la r√©cidive ne semblent toujours pas avoir √©t√© identifi√©s, repoussant ainsi la cr√©ation d‚Äôinstruments propres aux d√©linquants ayant une DI. -- Interest in the risk assessment for offenders with intellectual disabilities (ID) has particularly grown during the last 10 years. Two opinions are shared on this subject: some believe that the instruments used to measure risk in sexual offenders can apply to sexual offenders with ID while others support the idea of using and developing actuarial measures for these people. Three objectives were set in an attempt to clarify these two visions: 1) Compare recidivism rates between the two groups of sexual offenders (with and without ID), 2) Analyze the predictive validity of the eight most commonly used actuarial instruments (and the PCL-R) based on a sample of sex offenders with ID and 3) Analyze the composition of the instruments according to their domains (Knight and Thornton, 2007). The sample consisted of 550 sex offenders of which 54 have an ID. The results suggest that the two groups of sexual offenders have similar rates of recidivism. A limited number of instruments also seems to be effective for sex offenders with ID. The SVR-20 was found to have predictive validity regarding sexual recidivism, the RMC, the RMV and the MnSOST-R for violent recidivism and the VRAG for non-violent recidivism. However, it is justified to question how the risk of recidivism is assessed for this particular clientele. The composition analysis of the actuarial instruments seems important among sex offenders with ID since some domains could predict differently the risk of recidivism. Finally, many of the risk factors that may be more useful in predicting recidivism has not been identified yet, thus delaying the creation of instruments tailored to offenders with ID.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Pal√©o√©cologie d‚Äôune tourbi√®re √† perg√©lisol en d√©gradation du sud des Territoires du Nord-Ouest : implications pour le cycle du carbone

Dans la for√™t bor√©ale canadienne, les sols gel√©s en permanence (perg√©lisols) sont r√©pandus et ceux-ci sont principalement localis√©s dans les tourbi√®res o√π ils forment des plateaux sur√©lev√©s. J‚Äôutilise une chronos√©quence repr√©sentant le temps depuis le d√©gel d‚Äôun plateau de perg√©lisol des Territoires du Nord-Ouest pour comprendre les facteurs influen√ßant l‚Äôaggradation et la d√©gradation du perg√©lisol dans les tourbi√®res et √©valuer l‚Äôeffet du d√©gel sur l‚Äôaccumulation de carbone et la pr√©servation du carbone d√©j√† accumul√©. Les taux d‚Äôaccumulation de carbone associ√©s √† la pr√©sence de perg√©lisol dans le pass√© et au pr√©sent sont lents, et la tourbe est moins d√©compos√©e dans les secteurs ayant √©t√© affect√©s plus longtemps par le perg√©lisol. En somme, le perg√©lisol r√©duit l‚Äôaccumulation de carbone en surface mais permet une meilleure pr√©servation du carbone d√©j√† accumul√©. -- Peatlands have contributed to cool the Earth's climate during the Holocene by accumulating a large carbon pool. In the Canadian boreal forest, perennially frozen soils (permafrost soils) are abundant and they are located mainly in peatlands where they form elevated plateaus. Thawing permafrost caused by atmospheric warming or other disturbances lead to the collapse of plateaus and soil saturation, impacting vegetation cover and carbon cycling. Models suggest that northern latitudes will be the most severely affected by global warming as we are already observing a decline in permafrost cover. It is important to understand how permafrost thaw affects the peatland carbon sink function as feedbacks on the climate are possible if a large amount of greenhouse gas is emitted or sequestered. I use a chronosequence representing the time since permafrost in a Northwest Territories peatland to understand the factors influencing aggradation and degradation of permafrost in peatlands and to evaluate the effect of thawing on the carbon accumulation and preservation. The carbon accumulation rates associated with the presence of permafrost in the past and present are slow, and the peat is less decomposed in areas that have been affected by permafrost longer. In sum, permafrost reduces surface carbon accumulation but allows for better preservation of the carbon already accumulated.

Ces fibres sont pourvues de propri√©t√©s m√©caniques impressionnantes combinant rigidit√©, √©lasticit√© et t√©nacit√© √©lev√©es. Le BPH contenant un nombre √©lev√© d‚Äôacides amin√©s charg√©s et r√©actifs, nous avons pu r√©ticuler les films de mani√®re covalente √† l‚Äôaide d‚ÄôEDC ou de glutarald√©hyde. Les propri√©t√©s m√©caniques des films sont modulables en fonction de la concentration d‚ÄôEDC utilis√©e lors de la r√©ticulation ou en employant du glutarald√©hyde comme agent r√©ticulant. Les films sont √† la fois plus rigides et plus forts avec un degr√© de r√©ticulation √©lev√©, mais perdent leur extensibilit√© √† mesure que les segments libres de s‚Äô√©tirer lors d‚Äôune traction deviennent entrav√©s par les points de r√©ticulation. La r√©ticulation augmente √©galement la r√©sistance √† la d√©gradation enzymatique par la collag√©nase, les films les plus fortement r√©ticul√©s lui √©tant pratiquement insensibles. La spectroscopie infrarouge montre enfin que la r√©ticulation entra√Æne une transition de feuillets Œ≤ anti-parall√®les inter-mol√©culaires vers des structures de type h√©lices de collag√®ne/PPII hydrat√©es. Des liens sacrificiels ont √©t√© form√©s dans les films de BPH par traitement au pI et/ou avec diff√©rents m√©taux, i.e. Na+, Ca2+, Fe3+, afin de moduler les propri√©t√©s m√©caniques statiques et d‚Äô√©valuer le r√¥le de ces traitements sur le comportement d‚Äôauto-gu√©rison lors de tests m√©caniques cycliques avec diff√©rents temps de repos. Plus la valence des ions m√©talliques ajout√©s augmente, plus les propri√©t√©s m√©caniques statiques affichent un module, une contrainte √† la rupture et une t√©nacit√© √©lev√©s sans toutefois affecter la d√©formation √† la rupture, confirmant la formation de liens sacrificiels. Les tests m√©caniques cycliques montrent que les traitements au pI ou avec Ca2+ cr√©ent des liens sacrificiels ioniques r√©versibles qui m√®nent √† un processus d‚Äôauto-gu√©rison des performances m√©caniques d√©pendant du pH. L‚Äôajout de Fe3+ √† diff√©rentes concentrations module les performances m√©caniques sur un plus large intervalle et la nature plus covalente de son interaction avec les acides amin√©s permet d‚Äôatteindre des valeurs nettement plus √©lev√©es que les autres traitements √©tudi√©s. Le Fe3+ permet aussi la formation de liens sacrificiels r√©versibles menant √† l‚Äôauto-gu√©rison des propri√©t√©s m√©caniques. Les spectroscopies Raman et infrarouge confirment que le fer cr√©e des liaisons avec plusieurs acides amin√©s, dont les histidines et les DOPA. Les r√©sultats dans leur ensemble d√©montrent que les films de BPH sont des hydrogels biomim√©tiques du byssus qui peuvent √™tre trait√©s ou r√©ticul√©s de diff√©rentes fa√ßons afin de moduler leurs performances m√©caniques. Ils pourraient ainsi servir de matrices pour des applications potentielles dans le domaine pharmaceutique ou en ing√©nierie tissulaire. -- The byssus is a set of protein-based anchoring threads produced by marine mussels to tether to water immersed surfaces. These fibers have impressive mechanical properties combining stiffness, elasticity and toughness, as well as a self-healing behavior of their mechanical performance upon rest following removal of stress. These properties are the result of collagen-rich block copolymer-like proteins hierarchically assembled and of the presence of organo-metallic reversible sacrificial bonds. Even though these fibers have outstanding mechanical properties and a high content of potentially biocompatible collagen, the mussel farming industry still treats them as a waste. The main objective of this thesis was to use byssus as a sustainable biological feedstock to produce a new family of biomimetic protein-based materials. We developed a method to produce a byssus protein hydrolyzate (BPH) rich in charged amino acids (~30 % mol) and with good film-forming capabilities. A hydrogel rich in inter- and intra-molecular anti-parallel Œ≤-sheets and in collagen triple helical structures forms following the BPH solubilization at pH 10.5. After evaporation of water, the resulting film is insoluble in aqueous media as a result of the BPH self-assembly into stable secondary structures. The mechanical properties of the films are pH-responsive owing to their high electrostatic charges content that act like effective crosslinking points at the isoelectric point (pI = 4.5), but causes swelling of the protein matrix and loss of mechanical performance at pH higher or lower than the pI. The strain at fracture remains constant, which increases the toughness of the materials when moving toward the pI. The high content in charged and reactive amino acids was used to covalently crosslink the BPH films using either EDC or glutaraldehyde. Increasing the crosslinking degree gives rise to stiffer and stronger films but leads to a loss of extensibility as a consequence of protein chains being trapped by the crosslinking points. The crosslinked films become resistant to collagenase degradation even though infrared spectroscopy shows the conversion of aggregated strands to hydrated collagen/PPII related structures following the crosslinking reaction. Thus, the crosslinked collagen-related structural elements hinder the collagenase action on the BPH films. Sacrificial bonds were formed in the BPH films by treatments at their pI and/or with various metallic ions, i.e. Na+, Ca2+, Fe3+, in order to tune the mechanical properties and to evaluate the role of sacrificial bonds on the self-healing behavior during cyclic mechanical testing. Using metallic ions of higher valence to treat the films results in an increase of the modulus, strength and toughness without reducing the strain at fracture, confirming the formation of organo-metallic sacrificial bonds. Cyclic mechanical testing shows that pI and Ca2+ treatments create reversible ionic sacrificial bonds that induce a pH-dependent self-healing behavior. Fe3+ addition at various concentrations enables tuning the mechanical performances over a larger interval and to reach higher values than other treatments. This behavior is attributed to the more covalent nature of the iron-amino acids bonding and to the affinity of iron with numerous amino acids, including histidines and DOPA, as detected using Raman and infrared spectroscopy. Iron addition also leads to the formation of reversible sacrificial bonds that procure a self-healing behavior of the mechanical properties to BPH films. Altogether, our results show that the BPH films are byssus biomimetic hydrogels whose mechanical properties can be tuned by using various treatments or crosslinking reactions. The materials could thus find a niche as protein matrix in domains such as the pharmaceutical industry or soft tissue engineering.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Impact et r√©sonances du th√©√¢tre In-yer-face au Qu√©bec : Shopping and Fucking de Mark Ravenhill (adaptation de Christian Lapointe), Faire des enfants d‚Äô√âric No√´l et En dessous de vos corps je trouverai ce qui est immense et qui ne s‚Äôarr√™te pas de Steve Gagnon
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Le pr√©sent m√©moire porte sur la pr√©sence de la violence et de la sexualit√© sur la sc√®ne th√©√¢trale qu√©b√©coise, ainsi que sur l‚Äôinfluence du mouvement britannique In-yer-face sur la dramaturgie qu√©b√©coise contemporaine. Par l‚Äô√©tude comparative des didascalies des textes ainsi que des mises en sc√®nes de trois productions qu√©b√©coises ‚Äì soit Shopping and F**king (texte de Mark Ravenhill traduit par Alexandre Lefebvre, mise en sc√®ne de Christian Lapointe), Faire des enfants (texte d‚Äô√âric No√´l, mise en sc√®ne de Ga√©tan Par√©) et En dessous de vos corps je trouverai ce qui est immense et qui ne s‚Äôarr√™te pas (texte et mise en sc√®ne de Steve Gagnon) ‚Äì, ce m√©moire explore les diverses mani√®res de repr√©senter la violence et la sexualit√© sur la sc√®ne qu√©b√©coise actuelle. Ce travail d√©passe l‚Äô√©tude textuelle, il pr√©sente une r√©flexion sur le th√©√¢tre qu√©b√©cois et les nombreuses contraintes auxquelles les artistes doivent faire face lorsqu‚Äôils veulent pr√©senter un spectacle de th√©√¢tre comportant des sc√®nes de violence et de sexualit√© au Qu√©bec. -- This master's dissertation focuses on the presence of violence and sexuality on the Qu√©b√©cois theater scene, as well as the influence of the British movement In-yer-face on contemporary Qu√©b√©cois theater. Via the comparative study of stage directions in the texts and the staging of three Quebec productions - Shopping and F ** king (from Mark Ravenhill‚Äôs text, translated by Alexandre Lefebvre, directed by Christian Lapointe), Faire des enfants (by √âric No√´l, directed by Ga√©tan Par√©) and En dessous de vos corps je trouverai ce qui est immense et qui ne s‚Äôarr√™te pas (written and directed by Steve Gagnon) -, this paper explores ways of representing violence and sexuality on the Qu√©b√©cois contemporary theater stage. This work goes beyond textual study, it presents a cogitation on the Quebec theater and the many constraints that artists face when they want to present a theater performance that includes violence and sexuality in Quebec.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: √âtude de propri√©t√©s physico-chimiques des membranes lipidiques charg√©es d‚Äôacide palmitique/st√©rol et de st√©arylamine/cholest√©rol
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Les st√©rosomes, des v√©sicules artificielles compos√©es d‚Äôamphiphiles monoalkyl√©s et d‚Äôun grand pourcentage de st√©rols, sont prometteurs dans plusieurs domaines comme les industries pharmaceutiques et alimentaires. Il existe des st√©rosomes charg√©s n√©gativement, positivement et neutres. Dans ce m√©moire, nous avons approfondi nos connaissances sur les propri√©t√©s physico-chimiques des st√©rosomes charg√©s : acide palmitique (PA)/st√©rol et st√©arylamine (SA)/cholest√©rol (Chol). Premi√®rement, afin de mesurer la diffusion lat√©rale de PA dans les membranes PA/st√©rol (30/70 mol/mol) par RMN √† gradients puls√©s, nous avons tent√© de former des bicouches liquide-ordonn√©es (lo) orient√©es magn√©tiquement avec ce m√©lange. En s'inspirant de l‚Äôid√©e que l‚Äôajout de 1,2-dihexanoyl-sn-glyc√©ro-3-phosphocholine (DHPC), un lipide √† courtes cha√Ænes, dans le syst√®me 1,2-dimyristoyl-sn-glyc√©ro-3-phosphocholine (DMPC) m√®ne √† la formation de bicouches orient√©es, nous avons √©tudi√© la formulation PA perdeut√©r√©/acide hexano√Øque (HA)/Chol avec une proportion molaire de 25/18/57 √† plusieurs temp√©ratures; aucune formation de bicouches orient√©es n‚Äôa √©t√© observ√©e. Ce r√©sultat pourrait √™tre expliqu√© par la solubilisation partielle de HA en milieu aqueux. Alors, une quantit√© insuffisante serait ins√©r√©e dans la bicouche pour induire son orientation. La formulation PA perdeut√©r√©/DHPC/Chol n‚Äôa pas conduit, elle non plus, √† des bicouches orient√©es magn√©tiquement √† des temp√©ratures et concentrations lipidiques vari√©es. En √©tudiant le m√©lange DMPC/DHPC/Chol (67/17/14), nous avons remarqu√© que la pr√©sence de Chol inhibait l'orientation magn√©tique des bicouches. Tandis que le m√©lange DMPC/DHPC/stigmast√©rol (SS) avec les proportions molaires 67/19/14 et 72/21/7 conduisait √† des bicouches orient√©es avec leur normale (n) perpendiculaire au champ magn√©tique √† 40 ¬∞C et 50 ¬∞C. Ces r√©sultats sugg√®rent que le m√©lange PA/SS avec une proportion de lipide √† courtes cha√Ænes, HA et DHPC, pourrait mener √† des bicouches orient√©es magn√©tiquement. Le m√©lange PA/Chol avec un lipide √† courtes cha√Ænes pourrait aussi √™tre √©tudi√© en pr√©sence des lanthanides. Deuxi√®mement, nous avons examin√© la possibilit√© de moduler la lib√©ration de mat√©riel encapsul√© dans des liposomes essentiellement compos√©s de PA et d‚Äôun st√©rol. Il est connu que le m√©lange PA/Chol (30/70) √† pH ‚â• 7,5 forme des liposomes tr√®s peu perm√©ables. Il est avantageux de pouvoir moduler la perm√©abilit√© pour avoir un contr√¥le sur le temps de lib√©ration de leur contenu, qui est un param√®tre de grande importance pour les formulations liposomales de m√©dicaments. D‚Äôabord, il a √©t√© montr√© que l‚Äôacide ol√©ique (OA)/Chol (30/70) est capable de former des v√©sicules, ce qui n‚Äôavait jamais √©t√© prouv√© auparavant. Par contre, les bicouches OA/Chol (30/70) ne sont pas plus perm√©ables que les bicouches PA/Chol (30/70). L‚Äôajout de 1-palmitoyl-2-ol√©oyl-sn-glyc√©ro-3-phosphatidylcholine (POPC) dans le m√©lange PA/Chol n‚Äôaugmente pas plus la perm√©abilit√©. En effet, les cin√©tiques de relargage de calc√©ine des v√©sicules PA/POPC/Chol (15/27.5/57.5), POPC/Chol (40/60) et POPC √©taient tr√®s semblables √† celle de PA/Chol (30/70). Il a √©t√© remarqu√© que les √©tudes litt√©raires se contredisent √† propos de la perm√©abilit√© √† la calc√©ine des bicouches de phosphatidylcholine (PC). L‚Äôexplication de ces divergences est inconnue pour le moment. En rempla√ßant la moiti√© de la proportion molaire de Chol par le cholate de sodium (SC) dans le m√©lange PA/Chol (30/70), la membrane n‚Äô√©tait pas plus apte √† lib√©rer son contenu. Il se pourrait que le SC se retrouvant dans la bicouche n‚Äôinduit pas une diminution d‚Äôempilement. Il est aussi possible que le SC ne s'ins√®re pas dans la membrane √† cause de son hydrophilie consid√©rable et il pourrait alors former seul des micelles. En rempla√ßant compl√®tement le Chol par le sulfate de cholest√©rol (SChol), un st√©rol charg√© n√©gativement, et en pr√©parant les v√©sicules √† un bas pH, la formulation PA/SChol (30/70) m√®ne √† une tr√®s grande perm√©abilit√© √† pH 7.5; le relargage est provoqu√© par un saut de pH. Nos travaux sugg√®rent qu'il serait possible de moduler la perm√©abilit√© des liposomes en les pr√©parant avec le m√©lange PA/SChol/Chol en variant les proportions entre 30/63/7 √† 30/70/0. Le diagramme pH-composition du m√©lange PA/SChol/Chol indique que ces proportions conduisent, √† pH 7.4, √† la coexistence de phases solide et lo en diff√©rentes proportions, ce qui pourrait moduler la perm√©abilit√© membranaire. Troisi√®mement, les r√©sultats de perm√©abilit√© obtenus avec la calc√©ine et les difficult√©s survenues lors de l‚Äôextrusion des v√©sicules encapsulant cette sonde nous ont amen√© √† nous demander si la calc√©ine interagit avec les bicouches charg√©es. L‚Äôimpact de certains anions, dont la calc√©ine, a √©t√© examin√© sur les bicouches charg√©es positivement SA/Chol (50/50). La calorim√©trie diff√©rentielle √† balayage (DSC, de l‚Äôanglais differential scanning calorimetry), indique qu‚Äôil n‚Äôy a aucune transition entre 25 et 90 ¬∞C pour les liposomes SA/Chol (50/50) √† pH = 7.4. L‚Äôajout de chlorure de sodim (375 mM) n‚Äôa pas men√© √† la formation d‚Äôagr√©gats et aucune transition n‚Äôa √©t√© observ√©e sur le thermogramme. La formation d‚Äôagr√©gats macroscopiques instantan√©ment apr√®s l‚Äôajout d‚Äôhydrog√©nophosphate de sodium (125 mM), de sulfate de sodium (125 mM) et de calc√©ine (3 mM) a √©t√© observ√©e. Une transition a √©t√© observ√©e sur les thermogrammes en pr√©sence de ces sels. Les agr√©gats observ√©s pourraient √™tre associ√©s √† la transition de phase. L‚Äôeffet des anions sur la temp√©rature et l‚Äôenthalpie de transition suivent le m√™me ordre que la s√©rie d‚ÄôHofmeister : sulfate > hydrog√©nophosphate > chlorure (pas de pic). La calc√©ine avait l‚Äôimpact le plus prononc√© sur l‚Äôagr√©gation; ceci illustre que la calc√©ine n‚Äôest pas une sonde fluorescente inerte avec le m√©lange SA/Chol. Elle pourrait √™tre un chaotrope volumineux. De plus, les interactions SA-calc√©ine plus fortes, menant √† l‚Äôagr√©gation des v√©sicules, que les interactions PC-calc√©ine pourraient s‚Äôexpliquer par le fait que la SA est charg√©e positivement. -- Sterosomes are artificial vesicles that are composed of monoalkylated amphiphiles and a large percentage of sterols. They are promising in areas such as pharmaceutical and food industries. Sterosomes can be found in anionic, cationic and neutral form. The work of this master‚Äôs thesis focuses on gaining additional knowledge on the physicochemical properties of charged sterosomes such as palmitic acid (PA)/sterol and stearlyamine (SA)/cholesterol (Chol). Our first aim was to find an approach to form liquid-ordered (lo) bilayers that can orient in a magnetic field with the PA/sterol (30/70 mol/mol) mixture. This will allow us to study the lateral diffusion of PA. It has been demonstrated that mixing 1,2-diheptanoyl-sn-glycero-3-phosphocholine (DHPC), a short chain lipid, with 1,2-dimyristoyl-sn-glycero-3-phosphocholine (DMPC) results in bilayers that orient with their normal (n) perpendicular to the magnetic field. Therefore, perdeuterated PA/hexanoic acid (HA)/Chol (25/18/57) mixture was studied at different temperatures; however, results showed no bilayer orientation. It was suggested that this could be due to the partial solubility of HA in aqueous phase. Consequently, an insufficient quantity of HA was available to induce bilayer orientation. Furthermore, perdeuterated PA/DHPC/Chol mixture was studied at different temperatures and lipid concentrations, which also led to no bilayer orientation. While studying DMPC/DHPC/Chol (67/17/14) formulation, it was understood that Chol inhibits bilayer orientation. On the other hand, two different molar proportions of DMPC/DHPC/stigmasterol (SS) (67/19/14 and 72/21/7) led to bilayers that orient with their n perpendicular to the magnetic field at 40 ¬∞C et 50 ¬∞C. These results suggest that by adding a short chain lipid such as HA and DHPC to PA/SS mixture could lead to oriented bilayers. Another interesting track would be to work with PA/short chain lipid/Chol mixture in the presence of lanthanides. Our second aim was to find different formulations of vesicles, containing at least PA and a sterol, with distinctive permeability. It has already been established that PA/Chol (30/70) bilayers are in lo phase as long as PA is deprotonated (pH ‚â• 7,5) and have a very limited permeability. The ability to modulate permeability would allow control over the release time of an encapsulated product, which is an important parameter in the development of novel liposomal drug delivery systems. It was proven that oleic acid (OA)/Chol (30/70) mixture is able to form bilayers, which has not been shown previously. However, OA/Chol (30/70) bilayers were not much more permeable than PA/Chol (30/70) bilayers. Adding 1-palmitoyl-2-oleoyl-sn-glycero-3-phosphocholine (POPC) in PA/Chol system did not lead to higher permeability either. Results of calcein release kinetics from PA/POPC/Chol (15/27.5/57.5), POPC/Chol (40/60) and POPC vesicles were not very different from the one found for PA/Chol (30/70) vesicles. It was noted that contradictory results were found in the literature regarding calcein permeability from phosphatidylcholine (PC) membranes. For the moment, explanations related to these divergences have yet to be given. Furthermore, no increase in membrane permeability was found after substituting half of the molar proportion of Chol by sodium cholate (SC) in PA/Chol (30/70) mixture. One suggestion would be that SC insertion in the bilayer does not induce a reduction in the packing of lipids. Another suggestion would be that SC does not insert in PA/Chol bilayers due to its considerable hydrophilic character and forms micelles on its own. Highly permeable membrane was found when Chol was completely replaced by cholesterol sulfate (SChol), a negatively charged sterol, and vesicle preparation was done at low pH. The pH-triggered release method was used. Our work suggests that by varying the molar proportion of PA/SChol/Chol mixture between 30/63/7 and 30/70/0, it would be possible to obtain different vesicle formulations with distinctive permeability. In between these molar proportions, the pH-composition diagram of PA/SChol/Chol shows the coexistence of solid and lo phases in different proportions at pH 7.4, which could modulate the permeability. Some ambiguous calcein release results and struggles arising from the extrusion of calcein-encapsulated liposomes led us to wonder if this dye interacts with charged bilayers. The impact of some anions, including calcein, was examined on SA/Chol (50/50) charged bilayers. Thermodynamic studies were done by differential scanning calorimetry (DSC). SA/Chol (50/50) mixture showed no transition between 25 and 90 ¬∞C at pH 7.4. In the presence of sodium chloride (375 mM), there was no indication of aggregation or the appearance of a transition on the thermogram. Macroscopic aggregates were instantly observed after addition sodium hydrogenphosphate (125 mM), sodium sulphate (125 mM) and calcein (3 mM). Furthermore, a phase transition was also noticed on the thermograms in the presence of these salts. It is suggested that the appearance of the transition can be associated with the formation of aggregates. The effect of anions on the transition temperature and enthalpy follows the Hofmeister series: sulfate > hydrogenphosphate > chloride (no peak). Calcein had the highest impact on the formation of aggregates. This indicates that calcein is not a good candidate to be used as a fluorescent dye with SA/Chol mixture. It was suggested that calcein could be a large chaotrope anion. In contrast to PC-calcein interactions, SA-calcein interactions led to the aggregation of vesicles probably due to stronger interactions in the presence of positively charged SA.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Cartographie r√©cente et √©cologie du nerprun bourdaine en Estrie
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Le nerprun bourdaine (Rhamnus frangula L.) est une esp√®ce exotique qui envahit plusieurs r√©gions du sud du Qu√©bec, et plus particuli√®rement la r√©gion administrative de l'Estrie. Actuellement, on conna√Æt encore peu l'√©cologie de l'esp√®ce dans le contexte qu√©b√©cois et il n‚Äôexiste pas de portrait d‚Äôensemble de sa distribution dans les for√™ts temp√©r√©es de cette r√©gion. Dans ce contexte, le premier objectif du projet √©tait de cartographier par t√©l√©d√©tection la distribution du nerprun bourdaine dans deux secteurs de l'Estrie. Un second objectif √©tait d'√©valuer les variables environnementales d√©terminantes pour expliquer le recouvrement de nerprun bourdaine. La ph√©nologie du nerprun bourdaine diff√®re de celle de la plupart des esp√®ces indig√®nes arborescentes puisque ses feuilles tombent plus tard en automne. Cette caract√©ristique a permis de cartographier, par d√©mixage spectral, la probabilit√© d'occurrence du nerprun bourdaine gr√¢ce √† une s√©rie temporelle d'images du capteur OLI de Landsat 8. Le recouvrement du nerprun bourdaine a √©t√© calcul√© dans 119 placettes sur le terrain. La cartographie r√©sultante a montr√© un accord de 69% avec les donn√©es terrain. Une image SPOT-7, dont la r√©solution spatiale est plus fine, a ensuite √©t√© utilis√©e, mais n‚Äôa pas permis d'am√©liorer la cartographie, puisque la date d‚Äôacquisition de l‚Äôimage n‚Äô√©tait pas optimale d√ª √† un manque de disponibilit√©. Concernant le second objectif de la recherche, la variable la plus significative pour expliquer la pr√©sence de nerprun bourdaine √©tait la densit√© du peuplement, ce qui sugg√®re que l‚Äôouverture de la couverture foresti√®re pourrait favoriser l‚Äôenvahissement. N√©anmoins, les r√©sultats tendent √† d√©montrer que le nerprun bourdaine est une esp√®ce ¬´g√©n√©raliste¬ª qui s‚Äôadapte bien √† plusieurs conditions environnementales. -- Glossy buckthorn (Rhamnus frangula L.) is an exotic species invading many areas in southern of Quebec, particularly in the Eastern Townships. Currently, we do not know very much about the species ecology and no thorough study of its distribution in temperate forest has been performed. Therefore, the first objective of the project was to map the spatial distribution of glossy buckthorn in two areas of the Eastern Townships, using remote sensing techniques. The second objective was to evaluate the environmental variables, or predictors, best explaining the presence of glossy buckthorn. The phenology of glossy buckthorn differs from most of the indigenous tree species found in this area because its leaves fall later in autumn. This characteristic allowed to map, using spectral unmixing, the probability of occurrence of glossy buckthorn, with temporal Landsat 8 (OLI) imagery data series. Glossy buckthorn coverage was calculated on 119 plots on the field. The resulting maps showed an agreement of 69% with field data. A SPOT-7 image, which has a finer resolution than Landsat 8 (OLI), was then used but it did not improve the quality of the map, since its acquisition date was not optimal, due to a lack of availability. Concerning the second objective of the research, the best variable explaining the presence of glossy buckthorn was stand density, which leads to believe that forest cover openings could ease the establishment of buckthorn. However, the results tend to show that glossy buckthorn is a generalist species, easily adapting to various environmental conditions.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Le mode de ventilation neurally adjusted ventilatory assist (NAVA) est faisable, bien tol√©r√©, et permet la synchronie entre le patient et le ventilateur pendant la ventilation non invasive aux soins intensifs p√©diatriques : √©tude physiologique crois√©e
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Introduction: La ventilation non invasive (VNI) est un outil utilis√© en soins intensifs p√©diatriques (SIP) pour soutenir la d√©tresse respiratoire aig√ºe. Un √©chec survient dans pr√®s de 25% des cas et une mauvaise synchronisation patient-ventilateur est un des facteurs impliqu√©s. Le mode de ventilation NAVA (neurally adjusted ventilatory assist) est asservi √† la demande ventilatoire du patient. L‚Äôobjectif de cette √©tude est d‚Äô√©valuer la faisabilit√© et la tol√©rance des enfants √† la VNI NAVA et l‚Äôimpact de son usage sur la synchronie et la demande respiratoire. M√©thode: √âtude prospective, physiologique, crois√©e incluant 13 patients n√©cessitant une VNI dans les SIP de l‚Äôh√¥pital Ste-Justine entre octobre 2011 et mai 2013. Les patients ont √©t√© ventil√©s successivement en VNI conventionnelle (30 minutes), en VNI NAVA (60 minutes) et en VNI conventionnelle (30 minutes). L‚Äôactivit√© √©lectrique du diaphragme (AEdi) et la pression des voies a√©riennes sup√©rieures ont √©t√© enregistr√©es pour √©valuer la synchronie. R√©sultats: La VNI NAVA est faisable et bien tol√©r√©e chez tous les enfants. Un adolescent a demand√© l‚Äôarr√™t pr√©coce de l‚Äô√©tude en raison d‚Äôanxi√©t√© reli√©e au masque sans fuite. Les d√©lais inspiratoires et expiratoires √©taient significativement plus courts en VNI NAVA comparativement aux p√©riodes de VNI conventionnelle (p< 0.05). Les efforts inefficaces √©taient moindres en VNI NAVA (r√©sultats pr√©sent√©s en m√©diane et interquartiles) : 0% (0 - 0) en VNI NAVA vs 12% (4 - 20) en VNI conventionnelle initiale et 6% (2 - 22) en VNI conventionnelle finale (p< 0.01). Globalement, le temps pass√© en asynchronie a √©t√© r√©duit √† 8% (6 - 10) en VNI NAVA, versus 27% (19 - 56) et 32% (21 - 38) en p√©riodes de VNI conventionnelle initiale et finale, respectivement (p= 0.05). Aucune diff√©rence en termes de demande respiratoire n‚Äôa √©t√© observ√©e. Conclusion: La VNI NAVA est faisable et bien tol√©r√©e chez les enfants avec d√©tresse respiratoire aig√ºe et permet une meilleure synchronisation patient-ventilateur. De plus larges √©tudes sont n√©cessaires pour √©valuer l‚Äôimpact clinique de ces r√©sultats. -- Introduction: The need for intubation after noninvasive ventilation (NIV) failure is frequent in the pediatric intensive care unit (PICU). One reason is patient-ventilator asynchrony during NIV. Neurally adjusted ventilatory assist (NAVA) is a mode of ventilation controlled by the patient‚Äôs neural respiratory drive. The aim of this study was to assess the feasibility and tolerance of NIV-NAVA in children and to evaluate its impact on synchrony and respiratory effort. Methods: This prospective, physiologic, crossover study included 13 patients requiring NIV in the PICU of Sainte-Justine‚Äôs Hospital from October 2011 to May 2013. Patients were successively ventilated in conventional NIV as prescribed by the physician in charge (30 minutes), in NIV-NAVA (60 minutes), and again in conventional NIV (30 minutes). Electrical activity of the diaphragm (EAdi) and airway pressure were simultaneously recorded to assess patient-ventilator synchrony. Results: NIV-NAVA was feasible and well tolerated in all patients. One patient asked to stop the study early because of anxiety related to the leak-free facial mask. Inspiratory trigger dys-synchrony and cycling-off dys-synchrony were significantly shorter in NIV-NAVA versus initial and final conventional NIV periods (both p< 0.05). Wasted efforts were also decreased in NIV-NAVA (all values expressed as median and interquartile values): 0 (0 - 0) in NIV-NAVA versus 12% (4 - 20) and 6% (2 - 22) in initial and final conventional NIV, respectively (p< 0.01). As a whole, total time spent in asynchrony was reduced to 8% (6 - 10) in NIV-NAVA, versus 27% (19 - 56) and 32% (21 - 38) in initial and final conventional NIV, respectively (p= 0.05). No difference in term of respiratory effort was noted. Conclusion: NIV-NAVA is feasible and well tolerated in PICU patients and allows improved patient-ventilator synchronization. Larger controlled studies are warranted to evaluate the clinical impact of these findings.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: L'acide valpro√Øque inhibe la progression dans le cycle cellulaire chez Saccharomyces cerevisiae
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: L‚Äôac√©tylation est une modification post-traductionnelle des prot√©ines essentielles. Elle est impliqu√©e dans bon nombre de processus cellulaires importants comme la r√©gulation de la structure de la chromatine et le recrutement de prot√©ines. Deux groupes d‚Äôenzymes, soient les lysines ac√©tyltransf√©rases et les lysines d√©sac√©tylases, r√©gulent cette modification, autant sur les histones que sur les autres prot√©ines. Au cours des derni√®res ann√©es, de petites mol√©cules inhibitrices des d√©sac√©tylases ont √©t√© d√©couvertes. Certaines d‚Äôentre elles semblent prometteuses contre diverses maladies telles le cancer. L‚Äôacide valpro√Øque, un inhibiteur de deux des trois classes des d√©sac√©tylases, a un effet antiprolif√©ratif chez plusieurs organismes mod√®les. Toutefois, les m√©canismes cellulaires sous-jacents √† cet effet restent encore m√©connus. Ce m√©moire met en lumi√®re l‚Äôeffet pH d√©pendant de l‚Äôacide valpro√Øque sur diff√©rentes voies cellulaires importantes chez la levure Saccharomyces cerevisiae. Il d√©montre que ce compos√© a la capacit√© d‚Äôinhiber la transition entre les phases G1 et S par son action sur l‚Äôexpression des cyclines de la phase G1. De plus, il inhibe l‚Äôactivation de la kinase principale de la voie activ√©e suite √† un stress √† la paroi cellulaire. L‚Äôacide valpro√Øque occasionne √©galement un arr√™t dans la r√©plication de l‚ÄôADN sans y causer de dommage. Il s‚Äôagit l√† d‚Äôun effet unique qui, √† notre connaissance, n‚Äôest pas observable avec d‚Äôautres agents qui inhibent la progression en phase S. -- Acetylation is an essential post-translational modification involved in many important cellular processes such as regulation of chromatin structure and proteins interactions. Two enzyme families, lysine acetyltransferases and lysine deacetylases, allow proper regulation of this modification both on histones and non-histones proteins. In recent years, the discovery of small deacetylase inhibitors has led to promising novel therapy in the treatment against various diseases such as cancer. Valproic acid, a class I and II deacetylase inhibitor, has been shown to have antiproliferative effects in various models. However, the cellular mechanisms underlying this effect remain unknown. This thesis highlights the pH-dependent effects of VPA on numerous important cellular pathways in the yeast Saccharomyces cerevisiae. Our results demonstrate that VPA inhibits the transition from G1 to S phase of the cell cycle by its action on the expression of G1 cyclins. Moreover, VPA inhibits the activation of the main kinase involved in the cell wall integrity pathway. Furthermore, VPA exposure also leads to DNA replication arrest in a DNA damage-independent manner. This is a unique effect that, to our knowledge, is not observable with other agents that inhibit S phase progression.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: R√©concilier universalisme et ciblage : l‚Äô√©volution du paradoxe de la redistribution depuis la fin des ann√©es 1980
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Le Paradoxe de la redistribution de Walter Korpi et Joakim Palme (1998) postule que les √âtats-providences qui ont des d√©penses sociales moins cibl√©es redistribuent davantage. Ive Marx, Lina Salanauskaite et Gerlinde Verbist (2013) ont toutefois constat√© que le paradoxe d√©montr√© gr√¢ce √† une corr√©lation entre un indice de redistribution et un indice de ciblage des d√©penses sociales n'√©tait plus valide dans les ann√©es 2000. En reproduisant les corr√©lations, il appara√Æt que l'augmentation importante du ciblage dans des pays qui redistribuent beaucoup comme le Danemark et la Su√®de est la principale cause de la disparition de la corr√©lation entre redistribution et ciblage. Lors des crises √©conomiques dans les ann√©es 1980 et 1990, les prestations maximales d√©j√† relativement faibles ainsi que la volont√© de maintenir les prestations minimums et les taux de remplacement de la part des partis sociaux-d√©mocrates ont pouss√© les gouvernements danois et su√©dois √† r√©duire les prestations maximales afin de limiter l‚Äôaugmentation des d√©penses, augmentant ainsi le ciblage des d√©penses sociales tout en pr√©servant le caract√®re universel des programmes. L‚Äôaugmentation du ciblage des d√©penses sociales n‚Äôa pas eu d‚Äôeffets n√©gatifs sur la redistribution particuli√®rement au Danemark o√π la redistribution a augment√© et les in√©galit√©s diminu√© entre la fin des ann√©es 80 et le milieu des ann√©es 2000. -- The Paradox of redistribution by Walter Korpi and Joakim Palme (1998) posits that welfare states that have less targeted social spending redistribute more. However, Ive Marx, Lina Salanauskaite and Gerlinde Verbist (2013) found that the correlation between the social spending targeting index and the redistribution index that demonstrates the paradox has weakened in the 2000s. By replicating the correlations, it seems that the increase targeting of social spending in countries with high redistribution like Denmark and Sweden is the main cause behind the weakening of the correlation between targeting and redistribution. During the economic crisis of the 80s and 90s, the already low maximum benefits and the will of social-democratic parties to maintain the minimal benefits and replacement rate led Danish and Swedish governments to reduce maximum benefits to restrain the increase of social spending, thus increasing the targeting of social spending without sacrificing universalism.

rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Quelles sont les contraintes auxquelles font face les firmes africaines ? Cette √©tude a pour but de cerner les principaux d√©fis du climat des affaires africain en utilisant les donn√©es de la World Bank Enterprise Survey. Dans cette enqu√™te, deux questions majeures ont √©t√© pos√©es au gestionnaire de firmes : i) l‚Äôampleur des contraintes √©num√©r√©es pour leur activit√© et ii) la d√©cision d‚Äôinvestissement durant l‚Äôann√©e qui a pr√©c√©d√© l‚Äôenqu√™te. Nos r√©sultats montrent que, pour les firmes de notre √©chantillon, la d√©cision d‚Äôinvestissement est retard√©e par un ensemble d‚Äôobstacles parmi lesquelles : la corruption, l‚Äôacc√®s difficile au march√© financier, la concurrence d√©loyale du secteur informel et l‚Äôinstabilit√© politique. Nous proc√©dons ensuite √† une analyse de sensibilit√© et de robustesse en int√©grant parmi les variables de contr√¥le ; la taille des firmes, le secteur d‚Äôactivit√© et leur localisation. Nos r√©sultats montrent que les firmes de taille moyenne sont les plus vuln√©rables, elles sont diff√©remment affect√©es selon qu‚Äôelles soient dans le secteur des manufactures ou celui des services et les compagnies situ√©es en Afrique centrale sont tr√®s peu affect√©es par ces contraintes. -- What are the constraints faced by firms in their decision making in Africa ? This study aims at understanding the main challenges of the climate for African affairs by using the World Bank Enterprise Survey database. In this survey, two important questions are asked to the firms' managers to highlight : i) the severity of the constraints and ii) the history of past investment decision. Our results show that firms' investment decision in the sample of African countries considered is impeded by severe obstacles among which corruption, tightness of financial market, unfair competition of the informal sector and the political instability. We perform robustness and sensitivity analysis by extending control variables to firm's size, sector and localization. Our results show that midsize firms are the most vulnerable, firms in the services and manufacturing sector are affected differently and companies in Central Africa are little affected by these constraints.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: La r√©troaction corrective √† l‚Äô√©crit et la r√©vision des apprenants de fran√ßais langue seconde
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: La r√©troaction corrective (RC) est une indication offerte aux scripteurs apprenants sur leur emploi erron√© de la langue en apprentissage (Lightbown et Spada, 2006). Cette recherche s‚Äôest pench√©e sur la relation entre les diff√©rentes techniques r√©troactives utilis√©es par six enseignants de classes d‚Äôaccueil √† Montr√©al et sur la mani√®re dont les √©l√®ves participants (N=64) ont r√©agi √† ces RC lors de la r√©vision de leur texte. L‚Äôint√©gration de la RC √† l‚Äô√©tape de la r√©vision est influenc√©e par diff√©rentes variables mod√©ratrices, c‚Äôest-√†-dire l‚Äôordre d‚Äôenseignement (les niveaux de scolarit√© : primaire ou secondaire), le profil des √©l√®ves (les niveaux langagiers d√©butants et avanc√©s ainsi que la pr√©sence de difficult√©s d‚Äôapprentissage chez les √©l√®ves) et les cat√©gories d‚Äôerreurs. Les r√©sultats confirment que les enseignants de fran√ßais langue seconde (L2) diff√©rencient leur RC selon les variables mod√©ratrices et que la RC a un effet positif √† court terme, c‚Äôest-√†-dire lors de la r√©vision. -- Corrective feedback (CF) is defined as ‚Äúan indication to a learner that his or her use of the target language is correct‚Äù (Lightbown and Spada, 2006, p.197). When the written product is revised, the learner reacts to corrective feedback in different ways. This study focuses on two aspects: it focuses on the various CF techniques used by teachers of French as a second language in six ‚Äòaccueil‚Äô classrooms in Montreal, and it focuses on the reaction of 64 students in these classrooms, to these techniques in their revision process. How the teacher‚Äôs corrective feedback was incorporated in the revision process varied according to the student‚Äôs proficiency level (weak or strong), their grade level (elementary or secondary), their learning difficulties, their error types and the CF techniques used. The student‚Äôs written product, composed of 150 words, was analyzed. The results indicate that the teachers of French as a second language vary their CF techniques according to the variables. Corrective Feedback, overall, effected the student‚Äôs revision.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: L‚Äô√©valuation des d√©terminants des param√®tres h√©modynamiques centraux √† l‚Äôaide de la cohorte populationnelle CARTaGENE
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract:
Les maladies cardiovasculaires ont un impact consid√©rable sur la vie des Canadiens, et de nombreux efforts ont permis d‚Äôidentifier diff√©rents facteurs de risque associ√©s √† cette condition. L‚Äôhypertension art√©rielle repr√©sente un de ces facteurs modifiables les plus importants. Quoique l‚Äôhypertension est d√©finie √† l‚Äôaide de mesures de pression art√©rielle en p√©riph√©rie, il devient de plus en plus apparent que la mesure de pression centrale et de ses composantes auraient des avantages au niveau de la pr√©diction de la survenue d‚Äô√©v√©nements cardiovasculaires. Le pr√©sent m√©moire vise √† mieux caract√©riser deux d√©terminants de cette pression centrale, le traitement antihypertenseur √† base de b√™tabloqueurs et l‚Äôinsuffisance r√©nale chronique pr√©coce.
En utilisant les donn√©es recueillies dans la banque de donn√©es populationnelle CARTaGENE, il a √©t√© possible √† l‚Äôaide d‚Äôanalyses statistiques par appariement bas√© sur le coefficient de propension de d√©montrer que l‚Äôutilisation d‚Äôagents antihypertensifs de type b√™tabloqueurs √©tait associ√©e √† un profil h√©modynamique central d√©favorable. Ainsi, les individus recevant ces agents avaient une pression centrale et une amplification art√©rielle plus √©lev√©es que des individus du groupe contr√¥le appari√© et ce, malgr√© une pression p√©riph√©rique identique. Cet effet semblait √™tre incompl√®tement expliqu√© par la r√©duction du rythme cardiaque associ√© √† l‚Äôutilisation de b√™tabloqueurs.
Aussi, il a √©t√© d√©montr√© que l‚Äôinsuffisance r√©nale chronique de stade 3 (d√©bit de filtration glom√©rulaire estim√© entre 30 et 60 mL/min/1.73m2) n‚Äô√©tait pas associ√©e √† une √©l√©vation des param√®tres h√©modynamiques centraux, contrairement √† ce qui avait d√©j√† √©t√© d√©crit chez des individus avec insuffisance r√©nale chronique plus avanc√©e. De plus, le niveau d‚Äôalbuminurie ne serait √©galement pas associ√© √† un changement du profil central dans un sous-groupe de la cohorte CARTaGENE. -- Cardiovascular diseases have a large impact on Canadian‚Äôs lives, and throughout the years, several risk factors associated with this condition have been identified. Hypertension represents an important of the modifiable risk factors. While high blood pressure is usually defined using peripheral blood pressure measurements, it has recently been shown that measurements of the central blood pressure and its components are more precise predictors of incident cardiovascular events. The thesis aims at better characterising mainly two determinants of central blood pressure: beta-blocker use for the treatment of hypertension and early chronic kidney disease. Using data from the CARTaGENE populational cohort and propensity score matching techniques, it was shown that beta-blockers use in the treatment of hypertension are associated with an unfavorable central hemodynamic profile. Hence, individuals receiving these agents had higher central blood pressures and arterial amplification than individuals of the matched control group, despite identical peripheral blood pressures. This effect was mostly, but not only, explained by the associated reduction of the heart rate. It was also shown that stage 3 chronic kidney disease (estimated glomerular filtration rate between 30 and 60 mL/min/1.73m2) was not associated with an increase in central hemodynamic parameters, unlike what was previously shown in individuals with more advanced chronic kidney disease. Furthermore, albuminuria was not associated with detrimental changes in the central hemodynamic profile in a subset of CARTaGENE.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Le C≈ìur est une permanence, suivi de Empathie et souffrance dans T√™te premi√®re / Dos / Contre dos de Martine Audet
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Ce m√©moire en recherche cr√©ation est divis√© en deux principales sections : un recueil de po√©sie et un essai. Le recueil, intitul√© Le C≈ìur est une permanence, explore diff√©rentes interpr√©tations du ph√©nom√®ne d‚Äôempathie dans la cr√©ation litt√©raire. Afin que l‚Äôempathie devienne l‚Äôobjet du discours, ce dernier est centr√© sur la relation √† l‚Äôautre. L‚Äôempathie prend vie √† travers deux entit√©s, un ¬´ je ¬ª et un ¬´ tu ¬ª. Alors que le ¬´ je ¬ª entre en contact avec ses propres zones d‚Äôombres, il s‚Äôouvre tranquillement aux souffrances du ¬´ tu ¬ª. Au fil des po√®mes, le ¬´ je ¬ª et le ¬´ tu ¬ª apaisent leur douleur en la partageant, faisant de l‚Äôempathie une voie d‚Äôacc√®s √† l‚Äôintimit√©. Ce d√©ploiement de l‚Äôintime prend forme en trois temps : les sections replis de voix, point archim√©dien et ensembles vides. Le recueil accorde une importance particuli√®re √† la figure du corps comme v√©hicule de la souffrance. Il propose une r√©flexion sur l‚Äôamour, balan√ßant entre naufrage et terre promise, et fait de l‚Äôenfance une pierre de touche pour interroger la douleur. La deuxi√®me partie de ce m√©moire est un essai intitul√© Empathie et souffrance dans T√™te premi√®re / Dos / Contre dos de Martine Audet. Divis√© en trois chapitres, cet essai √©tudie l‚Äôempathie √† l‚Äô≈ìuvre dans le recueil de Audet, selon une approche bioculturelle. Il allie interpr√©tation litt√©raire, sciences cognitives de deuxi√®me g√©n√©ration et philosophie de l‚Äôesprit. Dans le premier chapitre, le concept de ¬´ simulation incarn√© ¬ª, d√©velopp√© par Vittorio Gallese, permet d‚Äôinterpr√©ter la figure du corps et de sugg√©rer qu‚Äôelle v√©hicule la douleur tout en √©tant la manifestation d‚Äôun effacement identitaire. Le deuxi√®me chapitre se penche sur l‚Äôintersubjectivit√© en lien avec l‚Äôempathie. Il int√®gre certaines notions cl√©s de la ph√©nom√©nologie husserlienne afin d‚Äôanalyser les manifestations du lien empathique unissant les deux pr√©sences parcourant le recueil de Audet. Le dernier chapitre explique comment les repr√©sentations de l‚Äôenvironnement dans lequel √©voluent ces pr√©sences peuvent refl√©ter leur souffrance. Pour ce faire, certains concepts li√©s √† l‚Äôenvironnement, particuli√®rement importants pour l‚Äô√©cocritique actuelle, sont analys√©s dans T√™te premi√®re / Dos / Contre dos, comme ceux de place et de nature. Ces derniers, √©tant construits par les perceptions propres √† la cognition humaine, sont envisag√©s d‚Äôun point de vue bioculturel. En interpr√©tant ces trois principaux aspects du texte (figure du corps, intersubjectivit√© et environnement), l‚Äôhypoth√®se selon laquelle la perception de la souffrance dans T√™te premi√®re / Dos / Contre dos repose essentiellement sur l‚Äôempathie comme effet et objet du discours s‚Äôen voit valid√©e. -- This M.A. thesis, combining research and creative writing, is divided in two parts: a poetry collection and an essay. The first part, Le C≈ìur est une permanance, explores different interpretations of empathy phenomenon in creative writing. In order for empathy to become the subject of my poetry collection I focused it‚Äôs discourse on the possibilities of a relation to another self. This relation takes form through the two entities of ‚ÄúI‚Äù (je) and ‚Äúyou‚Äù (tu). While the "I" comes into contact with its own darkness, it opens to the sufferings of the "you". Throughout the poetry collection, the "I" and the "you" soothe their pain by sharing it, making empathy a pathway to intimacy. This use of intimacy takes shape in three stages: the sections: replis de voix, point archim√©dien and ensembles vides. The poetry collection also gives special importance to the conception and representation of the body as a vehicle of suffering. The compilation proposes an interpretation of love that balances between shipwreck and promised land and uses childhood as a touchstone for questioning pain. The second part of this M.A thesis is an essay entitled Empathie et souffrance dans T√™te premi√®re / Dos / Contre dos de Martine Audet. The essay, divided into three chapters, examines empathy throughout Audet‚Äôs poetry collection, through a biocultural approach. It specifically combines literary interpretation with second-generation cognitive sciences and philosophy of mind. The first chapter analyzes literary representations of the body taking into account the concept of "embodied simulation", developed by Vittorio Gallese. It suggests that literary representations of the body convey pain while revealing identity issues. With this theoretical basis, the second chapter studies the relation between the ‚ÄúI‚Äô and the ‚Äúyou‚Äù. It also examines Husserl's phenomenology point of view of intersubjectivity to suggest the presence of an empathic, albeit problematic, link between the two presences in Audet‚Äôs collection. The final chapter explains how the representations of the environment, in which the two presences progress, mirror their suffering. To do this, it takes interests in the presence of certain key concepts related to the environment in T√™te premi√®re / Dos / Contre dos, such as place and nature. These concepts are particularly important for present ecocriticism. They can also be considered from a biocultural point of view in this essay, since being built by the perceptions belonging to human cognition. By interpreting three main aspects of Audet‚Äôs poetry collection (literary representations of the body, intersubjectivity and environment), the hypothesis that the perception of pain in T√™te premi√®re / Dos / Contre dos is essentially based on empathy as an effect and object of discourse is being validated.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Phosphodiesterase 6 generates intracellular cGMP microdomains in the native endothelium
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Endothelial cells (EC) are essential regulator of vascular homeostasis through the generation and release of various bioactive agents, including nitric oxide (NO). NO modulates several vascular functions such as vascular tone and permeability, through the stimulation of soluble guanylate cyclase (sGC) leading to the production of cGMP. Conversely, phosphodiesterases (PDEs) are enzymes metabolizing cyclic nucleotides (cGMP and cAMP) and are therefore major regulatory players for cGMP and cAMP signalling pathways. Although ECs are the main source of NO, little is known on the endothelial NO-cGMP signalling pathway and cellular outcomes. It was then hypothesized that a specific population of cGMP-phosphodiesterases allows ECs to stabilize cGMP levels despite the elevated production of NO. Expression of cGMP-phosphodiesterases was initially studied in resistance mesenteric arteries from mice. PDE5 and PDE6 were both found at mRNA and protein levels in native arteries but PDE6 is not found in cultured ECs. Interestingly, subcellular distributions of both enzymes were distinct. PDE5 appeared to be homogeneously distributed whilst PDE6 catalytic subunits (PDE6ÔÅ° and PDE6ÔÅ¢) showed a preferential staining in the perinuclear region. These results suggest that PDE6 might be involved in the regulation of cGMP microdomains. Based on these findings, a mathematical model was developed. Simulations of dynamic cGMP levels in ECs support the notion of cGMP microdomains dependent on PDE6 expression and localization. In the absence of PDE6, application of NO either as a single bolus or repetitive pulses led to a homogeneous increase in cGMP levels in ECs despite PDE5 homogeneous distribution. However, PDE6 subcellular targeting to the perinuclear membrane generated a cGMP-depleted perinuclear space. The findings from this study provide the first evidence of the expression and specific intracellular distribution of PDE6 in native endothelial cells that strongly support their involvement in the generation of cGMP microdomains -- Les cellules endoth√©liales (CEs) participent au maintien de l‚Äôhom√©ostasie vasculaire en g√©n√©rant et lib√©rant de nombreux agents bioactifs, incluant l‚Äôoxyde nitrique (NO). Le NO module plusieurs fonctions vasculaires telles que le tonus et la perm√©abilit√© vasculaire via la stimulation de la guanylate cyclase soluble (GCs) provoquant la formation de GMPc. D‚Äôautre part, les phosphodiest√©rases (PDEs) sont des enzymes m√©tabolisant les nucl√©otides cycliques (GMPc et AMPc) et participent donc √† des √©tapes essentielles du contr√¥le des voies de signalisation du GMPc et de l‚ÄôAMPc. Bien que les CEs soient la source principale de NO, la voie de signalisation NO-GMPc endoth√©liale et les r√©percussions fonctionnelles demeurent m√©connues. Nous avons alors √©mis l‚Äôhypoth√®se qu‚Äôune population sp√©cifique de PDEs ciblant le GMPc (PDEs-GMPc) permettrait aux CEs de maintenir des niveaux de GMPc faible malgr√© l‚Äôimportante production de NO. L‚Äôexpression des isoformes de PDEs-GMPc dans les art√®res m√©sent√©riques de souris fut initialement d√©termin√©e. PDE5 et PDE6 furent d√©tect√©es tant sous la forme d‚ÄôARNm que de prot√©ines dans les art√®res natives alors que PDE6 est absente de lign√©es de CEs en culture. La distribution intracellulaire des deux enzymes est distincte. Alors que PDE5 est distribu√© uniform√©ment dans le cytoplasme des cellules endoth√©liales, les sousunit√©s catalytiques de PDE6 (ÔÅ° et ÔÅ¢) sont pr√©f√©rentiellement pr√©sentes dans la r√©gion p√©rinucl√©aire. Ces r√©sultats sugg√®rent que PDE6 puisse √™tre impliqu√© dans le contr√¥le de microdomaines de GMPc. Des simulations effectu√©es √† l‚Äôaide d‚Äôun mod√®le math√©matique d√©velopp√© sur la base de ces donn√©es sont en accords avec la notion selon laquelle l‚Äôexpression et la distribution subcellulaire de PDE6 sont responsables de microdomaines de GMPc dans l‚Äôendoth√©lium. En absence de PDE6, l‚Äôajout de NO sous forme de bolus unique ou r√©p√©t√©e m√®ne √† une augmentation homog√®ne de la concentration cytoplasmique en GMPc malgr√© la pr√©sence de PDE5. Toutefois, la pr√©sence de PDE6 √† la membrane p√©ri-nucl√©aire cr√©e un espace p√©ri-nucl√©aire pauvre en GMPc. Les r√©sultats de cette √©tude forment les premi√®res √©vidences de l‚Äôexpression et de la distribution intracellulaire h√©t√©rog√®ne de PDE6 dans les cellules endoth√©liales natives et sugg√®rent leur implication dans la g√©n√©ration de microdomaines.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: La construction des attitudes envers les Roms : le cas fran√ßais
rdf:Description.dcterms:abstract: Repr√©sentant entre 10 et 12 millions d‚Äôindividus en Europe, les Roms sont confront√©s √† des discriminations et √† l‚Äôexclusion sociale. 40% des Europ√©ens refusent d‚Äôavoir des Roms comme voisins, alors que 70% de ceux-ci n‚Äôentretiennent m√™me pas de contact direct avec eux dans leur vie. Face √† la probl√©matique qu‚Äôoffrent ces statistiques, cette √©tude entend observer les m√©canismes de construction des attitudes envers les Roms. Je propose d‚Äôanalyser la production de ces attitudes au sein de deux milieux similaires, mais o√π les politiques d‚Äôint√©gration locales envers les Roms divergent, rendant ainsi les conditions des contacts intergroupes diff√©rent. Cette analyse part des postulats scientifiques selon lesquels l‚Äôint√©gration des migrants est un enjeu d‚Äôaction publique locale, et que les interactions sociales de qualit√© structurent les attitudes des uns par rapport aux autres. Ainsi, √† partir d‚Äôentrevues semi-dirig√©es r√©alis√©es dans les communes fran√ßaises de La Courneuve et d‚ÄôIvry-sur-Seine, je teste de mani√®re empirique quatre th√©ories dominantes dans le domaine des relations intergroupes: la th√©orie du contact, l‚Äôeffet halo, l‚Äôimpact des politiques locales d‚Äôint√©gration des immigrants et l‚Äôinfluence des m√©dias. -- Representing between 10 and 12 million individuals in Europe, the Roma population faces discrimination and social exclusion. 40% of Europeans refuse to have Roma as their neighbors, while 70% of them do not even have direct contact with them in their lives. Based on these observations, this study analyses how attitudes towards Roma are constructed. I propose to investigate this mechanism in two similar environments, but where local integration policies towards Roma diverge, making the conditions of intergroup contact differ. The analysis is premised on two scientific assumptions: that the integration of migrants is a local public policy issue; and that intergroup contact structures attitudes between majority and minority cultures. Thus, from semi-structured interviews in the French communes of La Courneuve and Ivry-sur-Seine, I empirically test four dominant theories in the field of intergroup relations: contact theory, the halo effect, the impact of local immigrants integration policies, and media influence.
